newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== New Features ==
* EVEMon now has a character Asset monitor. * EVEMon now has a character Wallet Journal monitor. * EVEMon now has a character Wallet Transactions monitor. * EVEMon now has a Market Unified Uploader. * EVEMon now has a character Factional Warfare monitor.
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash bug when Overview tab is the last in Tab collection. * Fixed a bug where the installation for an industry job is wrongly assigned. * Fixed a bug where plan entries where not getting correctly removed internally upon restoring a plan. * Fixed a visual bug with search text not reseting upon changing monitor. * Fixed a visual bug when ampersand is used in user entered text in Character Info. * Fixed a bug when sorting by 'Quantity' in Market orders monitor. * Fixed a bug where google calendar wasn't updating the correct event. * Fixed a visual bug in API keys management window when using large fonts. * Fixed a bug in Skill browser where selecting an owned skill had unwanted behavior. * Fixed an bug where a character is added in monitoring collection after it has been deleted. * Fixed a visual bug where the notification about insufficient balance was not updated when character balance was updated. * Fixed a bug where contact notifications type where not shown correctly. * Fixed a bug where blueprint selector was losing focus when using search list.
== Enhancements ==
* Industry jobs that have been completed but not delivered, even passed the max period EVEMon tracks them, will now be shown. * Tooltip in any monitor has infinite display time and is displayed hovering over at any position. * Tooltip in Plan Queue has infinite display time and is displayed hovering over at any position. * An informative tooltip is shown when similar items are selected in Asset monitor. * Added selections to enable or disable all in features menu. * Added an informative text when no character is monitored and overview tab is disabled. * Adding ability to export to csv, monitored info (where it makes sense). * Solar systems and locations are now colored according to their security level. * EVEMon will now notify only for unread EVE notifications.
== Misc ==
* Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better, faster and more stable application.
